Equipment Actions.Action 1: Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 10ft, Average Damage: 36 Piercing and can grapple
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Claws, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 15ft, Average Damage: 28 Slashing
Equipment Actions.Action 3: Horns, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 10ft, Average Damage: 32 Piercing
Equipment Actions.Action 4: Tail, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 20ft, Average Damage: 24 Bludgeoning

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Tarrasque uses its Frightful Presence and then makes 5 attacks, one with its Bite, two with its Claws, one with its Horns and one with its Tail.  It can use Swallow instead of Bite
Other Actions.Action 2: Frightful Presence, Each creature that can see the Tarrasque feels the sheer pressure of the Tarrasque's power, making a Wisdom saving throw or becoming frightened of the Tarrasque
Other Actions.Action 3: Swallow, The Tarrasque swallows a creature it is grappling, trapping them in its stomach and burning them alive with its stomach acid, dealing an Average 56 damage

Abilities.Ability 1: Legendary Resistance, If the Tarrasque fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead
Abilities.Ability 2: Magic Resistance, The Tarrasque has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects
Abilities.Ability 3: Reflective Carapace, When the Tarrasque is targeted by Magic Missile, a line spell or a spell that requires an attack roll, there is a 1 in 6 chance that the Tarrasque's Carapace reflects the spell back onto the caster
Abilities.Ability 4: Siege Monster, The Tarrasque deals double damage to objects and structures

Damage Immunities.Damage 3: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks

Legendary Actions.Action 1: Attack, The Tarrasque makes one Claw or Tail attack
Legendary Actions.Action 2: Move, The Tarrasqque moves up to half its speed
Legendary Actions.Action 3: Chomp, The Tarrasque makes one Bite attack or Swallows a creature it is grappling
